Hey guys and girls

im FlintPies

Here's the first episode of of 3 Drunk Kerbals

=Info=

its about 3 drunk kerbals and their adventures,

going back when they went to the moon , when they first face planet into the ground

also how they forgot to put chutes on and Bob saved then all and when Bill got hungry and used the rcs as a BBQ.

such great times

why don't you come on the adventure?

be careful they might make you clean the toilets.

Enjoy the video fellow ksp players
